entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
